column4: wondering if there is a different/better GUI distro for PPC than 10.10 Maverick Meerkat?  something else I could/should try?
did you MD5 test the ISO?
i did not, but it is the Ubuntu_PowerPC_maverick from ubuntu.com
doesn't matter where it's from. It can still be mangled in transit
test the ISO so you know it's complete and consistent
would that affect the ability of the PPC to read it from USB and/or booting from USB?
if the data is corrupt, it won't work correctly
my DL did not pass md5!  re-downloading from cdimage.ubuntu.com
np man, remember to MD5 test in future. Torrents help verify data
I am using "hdiutil convert" to change the ISO to an IMG, and then dd if to make a bootable image on the Firewire per instructions on dl/server/dl from ubuntu.com
Is it possible to install vial Target Disk mode if I cannot get USB/FW to work?
not sure, not used it dude. If you have a floppy drive there is a floppy image to boot usb
got a working md5 checksum, still no love
